mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT r.num, shelterName, title, writer, viewCount, TO_CHAR(r.regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') regdate, checked, scope, id FROM reserve r INNER JOIN shelter s ON shelterName = s.name ORDER BY r.num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (num, title, scope, pwd, writer, shelterName, reservedDate, reservedTime, name, phoneNumber, content, regDate) VALUES(reserve_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{scope}, #{pwd}, #{writer}, #{shelterName}, #{reservedDate}, #{reservedTime}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, shelterName, title, writer, viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') regdate, reservedDate, reservedTime, name, phoneNumber, content, checked, scope FROM reserve WHERE num = #{num}
